blogPost.excerpt: Earn more revenue from your app or site without showing ads (OR) placing more ads AudiencePlay converts every user footprint into audiences and shares it with brands to unlock an alternative revenue stream Secure + ISO27001 Certified + Privacy Complaint
blogPost.body: Earn more revenue from your app or site without showing ads (OR) placing more ads AudiencePlay converts every user footprint into audiences and shares it with brands to unlock an alternative revenue stream Secure + ISO27001 Certified + Privacy Complaint
blogPost.title: AudiencePlay - Free monetization platform for websites and apps
blogPost.author: Raghu KLN

localize.description: 从您的应用程序或网站赚取更多的收入，而不显示广告（或）放置更多的广告AudiencePlay将每一个用户足迹转化为受众，并将其与品牌共享，以解锁另一种收入来源安全+ISO27001认证+隐私投诉。
localize.tagline: 网站和应用的免费货币化平台

localize.description: 從您的應用程序或網站賺取更多的收入，而不顯示廣告（或）放置更多的廣告AudiencePlay將每一個用戶足跡轉化爲受衆，並將其與品牌共享，以解鎖另一種收入來源安全+ISO27001認證+隱私投訴。
localize.tagline: 網站和應用的免費貨幣化平臺
